thread.title: BRIEF-Donegal Group Unit Plans To Consolidate Certain Operations & Close Branch Office Of Peninsula Insurance Company Effective July 2

title: BRIEF-Donegal Group Unit Plans To Consolidate Certain Operations & Close Branch Office Of Peninsula Insurance Company Effective July 2

organizations.name: rtain operations & close branch office of peninsula insurance company effective july

text:
Market News April 3, 2018 / 3:18 PM / in 18 minutes BRIEF-Donegal Group Unit Plans To Consolidate Certain Operations & Close Branch Office Of Peninsula Insurance Company Effective July 2 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 3 (Reuters) - Donegal Group Inc: 
* UNIT PLANS TO CONSOLIDATE CERTAIN OPERATIONS & CLOSE BRANCH OFFICE OF PENINSULA INSURANCE COMPANY EFFECTIVE JULY 2 
* EXPECTS TO ACHIEVE ANNUALIZED EXPENSE SAVINGS OF ABOUT $3.7 MILLION AS A RESULT OF IMPLEMENTING PENINSULA CONSOLIDATION 
* EXPECTS RESTRUCTURING CHARGE FOR EMPLOYEE TERMINATION COSTS ASSOCIATED WITH PENINSULA CONSOLIDATION OF ABOUT $1.9 MILLION TO $2 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
